name: Escape from the lounge
description:
Description:
• Escape from the lounge is an escape type game, where you need to look around and search for the items that will help you escape from the room. The game is meant to be funny so keep that in mind. Enjoy!

Instructions:
Search for items to escape the room.

Game Dimensions: 660x480

Game Category: Puzzles, Escape, Other

Movement: Not Available
Fire / Action: Left Mouse Button
Jump: Not Available
